title: Launch Community Grants Program
summary: This proposal aims to launch the DAO Community Grants Program to support developers, researchers, and contributors building within the ecosystem. The program will allocate a portion of the DAO treasury to fund innovative projects, tools, and educational content that align with DAO's mission of building scalable, secure, and decentralized rollup infrastructure. After approving this proposal, DAO takes a strategic step toward fostering long-term community engagement and ecosystem growth.
